scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && npm run build:copy-icon
scripts.firefox: npm run build && cd dist && npx web-ext run
scripts.sign: npm run build && cd dist && npx web-ext sign --api-key=$AMO_JWT_ISSUER --api-secret=$AMO_JWT_SECRET --channel=unlisted && cd .. && npm run sign:rename
scripts.sign:rename: cp dist/web-ext-artifacts/*.xpi streamfluency-$(grep '"version"' public/manifest.json | cut -d'"' -f4)-signed.xpi 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../streamfluency.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '__MACOSX/*'
